law.catch_line: Reports from local boards to state board.
law.text:
Each local citizen foster care review board shall forward annually to the State Citizen Foster Care Review Board a report and any recommendations regarding:
The policies and practices of the cabinet, the court, and other child-caring facilities and child-placing agencies which affect permanence for children in out-of-home placement; and
The process of local citizen foster care review.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 95, effective July 1, 1987.
